list.title: All Tasks
list.dailyRateGraphDesc: Review progress of daily tasks. The daily task progress rate is average progress rate of started tasks per each day.

dashboard.title: Real-Time Progress
dashboard.titleDesc: The task progress status is shown based on the time of your access to this page.
dashboard.countOfConditionsDesc: Progress status of task / subtask / step in "Task management" depends on the "Schedule" and "Progress rate"

message.closeSure: Are you sure you want to end the selected tasks? If you end it relevant data will be no longer collected.
message.closeFail: Failed to end the task please try again later.
message.deleteSure: Are you sure you want to delete the selected tasks? If you delete it relevant data will be no longer collected and be deleted. The deleted data cannot be restored.
message.deleteFail: Failed to delete the task please try again later.

detail.title: Selected Task Details
detail.subTasksProgressGraphDesc: The progress of subtask is calculated based on the progress of overall phases.

subTaskDetail.title: Selected Subtask Details
subTaskDetail.stepsProgressGraphDesc: The progress rate of step is calculated based on the overall progress rate of actions.

new.title: Add New Task
new.sceneGroupInfoDesc: The selected "Content" is added as a "Task". The "Scene group" within the content is turned into "Subtask" and you can set up assignee and schedule.

manage.registerNewTaskInfoDesc: Set up a task schedule and task assignee to record task report data based on the schedule.
manage.taskAddNoticeDesc: Based on the information registered in the existing task newly set the task schedule and the task assignee and record the task report data based on the schedule.
manage.taskWorkerDesc: Setting the task assignee results in assigning the same person to be the subtask assignee
manage.taskPositionDesc: Notify the task location to task assignee
manage.subTaskScheduleDesc: Sub-task schedules can be changed within the given task period.
manage.subTaskWorkerChangeDesc: Receive subtask reports with updated information

message.taskUpdateFail: Failed to edit the task, please try again later.
message.subTaskUpdateFail: Failed to edit the subtask, please try again later.

newTarget.duplicate: Duplicate content and register it as a task
newTarget.duplicateDesc: Duplicate the "Content" and place it into "Task Management". Issue new "Task target" to the duplicated content and manage it as a "Task".
newTarget.transform: Turn content into a task and then update.
newTarget.transformDesc: Use existing "Content targets" as the "Task targets". Since a "Content" is turned into a "Task" it is moved to "Task Management" and can no longer be managed from "Content list"
newTarget.registerComment: Updating a new task with the information you entered.

message.registerFail: Failed to update the task, please try again later.
message.registerStroageFail: Updating task failed due to the insuffient storage capacity.

addTarget.duplicateDesc: Duplicate content used in an existing "Task" into the "Task content". Issue new task targets for the composition details of duplicated content.
addTarget.transformDesc: Ending the exisiting task and no further reporting will be made. You will be receiving task report from the newly updated task and the same target of existing task will be used.
addTarget.registerComment: Create additional task with the information you entered.

message.registerFail: Failed to create additional task, please try again later.
message.registerStroageFail: Failed to create additional task due to insuffient storage capacity.
